thread.title: BRIEF-Blackhawk Network Says If Merger Terminated In Certain Circumstances, Co To Pay Fee Of $109 Mln To P2 Capital Partners, Silver Lake

title: BRIEF-Blackhawk Network Says If Merger Terminated In Certain Circumstances, Co To Pay Fee Of $109 Mln To P2 Capital Partners, Silver Lake

organizations.name: brief-blackhawk network says if merger terminated in certain circumstances

text:
#Market News January 16, 2018 / 1:30 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Blackhawk Network Says If Merger Terminated In Certain Circumstances, Co To Pay Fee Of $109 Mln To P2 Capital Partners, Silver Lake Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Blackhawk Network Holdings Inc: 
* BLACKHAWK NETWORK SAYS IF MERGER TERMINATED IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES, CO TO PAY FEE OF $109 MILLION TO P2 CAPITAL PARTNERS, SILVER LAKE - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2EJXhmY ) Further company coverage:
